title: PolyMarket Bot
description: A Go-based Polymarket CLOB trading engine with real-time market feed processing, EIP-712–derived API credentials, HMAC-L2 authentication, and latency-tuned automated order execution.

title: Upwork Job Analyzer
description: A browser extension that automatically analyzes Upwork job listings in real-time using a weighted scoring system to help freelancers quickly identify which jobs are worth applying to based on factors like competition level, client quality, and payment verification..

title: Casheee
description: An ecommerce store for selling casheee products.

title: VapeReviews
description: A website for reviewing vapes, written using React and NextJS with Supabase.

title: Cryptox-Heatmap
description: A heatmap of the crypto market, written with the help of the CoinGecko API.

title: RevenueTrackX
description: A website for tracking your revenue, written using React and NextJS.

title: Web4Crypto
description: https://www.web4crypto.net/; A startup made exclusively by me to promote my crypto-related developer services.

title: SeekerNotes
description: An aesthetic WIP notes-taking app for Windows & Linux written using React and wails (golang).

title: PsychMusic
description: An extremely mathematically concept attempt at producing psychedlic-like visuals that change around the music you're playing.

title: Crypfolio
description: https://crypfolio.pages.dev/; A SaaS to keep track of your crypto portfolio.

title: Hyflip Mod/Website/Server
description: Paid Bazaar/auction house flipper for Hypixel Skyblock, optimised to reduce server load and minimise flipping delay. Paired with a powerful mod written in Kotlin, and a (private) backend written in Golang.

title: DevSpoofGO
description: A 5900+ LOC project written in Golang (injector) and C++ (dll) that allows you to inject programs with an in-memory override DLL.

title: DevSpoofGOTest
description: A 1500+ LOC project written in Golang that allows you to test registry/WMI/WinAPI values.

title: NotesX
description: A fully responsive self-hosted note-taking website with an elegant design and convenient note-writing and managing.

title: LoanTracker
description: A SaaS-inspired website to track loans, built using React/Tailwind and Express/MySQL/Redis.

title: ZeqaStores
description: ZeqaStores is a modern MERN-based e-commerce store with a sleek UI, built for a customer with the MERN stack in 3 days.

title: pfpm
description: A pathfinding (WIP) plugin for PocketMine-MP, encouraging extensibility using API for developers

title: Moosik
description: A music downloading and sharing website that was eventually scrapped to avoid legal issues.

title: NotTwitterFront
description: Frontend of the self-developed social media website that serves as a replacement for/is heavily inspired by Twitter, made using React and Tailwind.

title: NotTwitterBackend
description: Backend of the self-developed social media website that serves as a replacement for/is heavily inspired by Twitter, made using Express.

title: PasswordManager
description: A password manager app inspired by KeePassXC, featuring Argon2 hashing for master passwords and encryption for stored passwords. Supports multiple profiles and secure backup functionality.

title: PoggitPE
description: A plugin for downloading plugins from Poggit automatically, featuring an anti-abuse system and plugin information viewing capabilities. Created as part of a speedrunning challenge.

title: Portfolio Website
description: This very website!

title: RedditVideoMakerBot-Updated
description: Updated a really cool project to automatically generate reddit videos. Fixed bugs, added comment support, text customization, keyword searching, swear filter, etc etc.
